thread.title: Larry Badten
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Larry Badten

author: Larry Badten
title: Larry Badten
text: Dave spent a good deal of time answering all of my questions. Obviously an expert in his field, he steered me towards the lower price item of those that I was considering because it was appropriate for my use. Overall I feel like a got a very nice knife (and wetstone) at a good price. It was sharpened to a razor edge at no additional cost. He has earned my trust and future business.
